title: {Suggestion} Can we have an end game chat
body: Some of my friends were made after these games were we would talk for a bit afterwards and then ask for an add on league. Might be a good thing to put back as some times new players also ask questions in these end game chats that will help them out

replies.body: the end game chat is there.. it's on the bottom left
https://imgur.com/H63Qxmj although I am having this issue of no end game chat
Same here I am having the same problem

Hi

Do you guys see this every game or only in some games?

Cheers

Mindstar

Hey Agent Mindstar

I have seen the chat end game a couple times but have also not seen it other times. Seems to need the client restarted as repeated games dont show the end game chat.

Thanks Decenten
Thanks for clarifying.  BTW - Have you sent in a bug report about this?
Yep and also attached the screenshot above with it
